TextView.android:text: Provide your Vehicle maximum protection through comprehensive plan which offers coverage for both the third party as well as own damage.
Third-party insurance offers protection against damages to the tp by the insured vehicle.According to Motor Vehicle Act.1983 every vehicle owner must possess a tp insurance.
Explore our Own Damage plans to safeguard your vehicle against unforeseen own damages such as road accident, fire etc. \n
Select The Right IDV For You
*IDV is the maximum sum assured fixed by the insurer that is offered in case of theft or loss of vehicle
4 out of 5 users select an IDV within this range
*Coverage includes compensation of ₹ 15 Lakh to the family of the registered owner-driver in case of an accidental death.
Do You have an active driving licence
Do you have an alternate PA Cover?
Do you have alternate GPA cover?
PA COVER TO EMPLOYEES OF INSURED
No Any Additional covers are available
No Any Add On covers are available
Discount id offer if policyholder voluntarily agrees to pay predetermined amount from his pocket against future repairs at the time of claim.
